system.availability: Set of sensors and scrying devices worn and looked through. As a Half Action, wearer enable/disable device, whilst enabled can make +10 Awareness test to detect Psykers and Daemonic Creatures without the need for normal lighting as well as +10 to BS Tests to hit them until the end of the encounter. All other sight-based tests have -20 however.
system.cost: Can't be used alongside another piece of headgear such as a helmet. For evety 5 minutes used beyond the first minute wearer gains 1 fatigue.
